name: sample-cloud
description: A sample cloud of examples built on Apollo Federation.

scripts.install: (cd service-accounts; npm i; cd ..;) & (cd service-reviews; npm i; cd ..;) & (cd service-colors; npm i; cd ..;) & (cd service-photos; npm i; cd ..;) & (cd gateway-rowdy; npm i; cd ..;) & (cd gateway-hue-review; npm i; cd ..;)
scripts.start: ((cd service-accounts; npm start) & (cd service-reviews; npm start)& (cd service-colors; npm start) & (cd service-photos; npm start)) & ((sleep 2; cd gateway-rowdy; npm start) & (sleep 2; cd gateway-hue-review; npm start))
